main event: A single source of light with an orange-red color was observed in Garwolin, Poland on September 9, 1957.
interesting points: The light was stationary along the horizon before rising straight up,The sighting lasted for about 15-20 seconds,The object was silent during the observation,The weather conditions were clear with no overcast,The report indicates that it was a motor sighting.
sighted object: single source of light, orange-red color
